_header: So fair so fresh so goodly on to see
_description: Charles d’Orléans, a roundel — fourteen lines

BNfr25458.First Lines:
[S]o fayre so freshe so goodely on to seSo welle dymeynet in al
                    your gouernans…
BNfr25458.Last Lines:
…Wher fore y pray yow sethe to my greuanceAnd put osyde all
                    myn aduersiteSo fayre &c.
